actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to ensure that public availability of information concerning stocks traded on an established stock exchange continues to be freely and readily available to the public through all media of mass communication.

summary.text: Trading Information Act - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to state that nothing in such Act or any other law shall limit or inhibit the dissemination by any medium of mass communication of information compiled from a stock ticker or otherwise for transactions on a national securities exchange, to the extent that such information is excluded from Federal copyright protection.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to ensure that public availability of information concerning stocks traded on an established stock exchange continues to be freely and readily available to the public through all media of mass communication.
